topic.title: Three-Party Conference
topic.shortdesc: You can make a three-party conference call on TA1600/2400/3200.

body.p:
Assuming that A and B are in the call and B wants to invite C to a conference. Check the following steps of how to establish a conference.
B presses flash key or taps hook flash to get a dial tone; A will hear the on hold music meanwhile.
B dials C's number.
If C answers the call, then B presses flash key or tap hook flash, the conference will be established, including A, B, and C.
If there is no answer on C, A can press flash key or tap hook flash to resume the call with A.
C will be ejected if B presses flash key or taps flash hook during the conference call.
